T02D2227:92a-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2227:92a-5: rdo rje bye drag smra rnam rig / dbu ma'i rim bzhin gsal ba yi //
T02D2227:92a-6: chos dang gang zag bdag med la //
T02D2227:92a-7: btung de de nyid bshad par bya //
T02D2227:92a-8: kha cig gang zag ces bya smra //
T02D2227:92a-9: rtag min mi rtag ma yin zer //
T02D2227:92a-10: nam mkha' dang ni 'gogs pa gnyis //
T02D2227:92a-11: 'dus ma byas gsum rtag pa yin //
T02D2227:92a-12: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag ste //
T02D2227:92a-13: 'gro ba phung po lnga bdag nyid //
T02D2227:92b-0: srid pa sdug bsngal @92b bden pa ste //
T02D2227:92b-1: de ni 'bras bu shes par bya //
T02D2227:92b-2: rgyu ni kun 'byung bden pa ste //
T02D2227:92b-3: las dang nyon mongs bdag nyid do //
T02D2227:92b-4: bden pa de gnyis zag bcas te //
T02D2227:92b-5: phyi ma gnyis ni zag pa med //
T02D2227:92b-6: las dang nyon mongs yongs zad nas //
T02D2227:92b-7: shin tu 'ang 'gogs par gyur pa na //
T02D2227:92b-8: dam pa'i rnam thar mngon sum don //
T02D2227:92b-9: zhi ba sdug bsngal zad ba yin //
T02D2227:92b-10: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad de ni //
T02D2227:92b-11: goms pas nges par 'byin pa'i mchog / yang dag bstan pa la sogs zhes //
T02D2227:92b-12: yan lag brgyad lam thub pas gsungs //
T02D2227:92b-13: de nyid nyan thos mya ngan 'das //
T02D2227:92b-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pa yang //
T02D2227:92b-15: lung bstan pa la mi ltos par //
T02D2227:92b-16: rang gi sngon gyi smon lam gyis //
T02D2227:92b-17: don mngon byas nas mya ngan 'das //
T02D2227:92b-18: lhag mar bcas pa'i lus kyis su //
T02D2227:92b-19: bdag nyid chen po de kun nas //
T02D2227:92b-20: bdag dang gzhan don nus pa nyid //
T02D2227:92b-21: rang gi 'dod pa bsten nas su //
T02D2227:92b-22: mar me ltar yongs mya ngan 'das //
T02D2227:92b-24: bye brag smra ba'i gnas pa'o //
T02D2227:92b-25: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
T02D2227:92b-26: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //
T02D2227:92b-27: de dag bdag med pa ru ni //
T02D2227:92b-28: yang dag shes pa'i yul du byas ;
T02D2227:92b-29: / dam pa'i shes pa gnyis kyis tshul //
T02D2227:92b-30: mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag ste //
T02D2227:92b-31: yul gyi rang gi mtshan nyid la //
T02D2227:92b-32: mngon sum lkog tu gyur pa'o //
T02D2227:92b-33: yul dang dus ni nyi tshe ba //
T02D2227:92b-34: phra rab rdul dang skad cig mas //
T02D2227:92b-35: don gyi bya ba nus pa'i phyir //
T02D2227:92b-36: de nyid don dam dngos po yin //
T02D2227:92b-37: nam mkha' la sogs lta zhog gi //
T02D2227:92b-38: bya ba'i don kun 'dod pa yis //
T02D2227:92b-39: tshad ma'i yul du byas nas su //
T02D2227:92b-40: de nyid 'dir ni yongs su brtag /'di ltar bum pa la sogs gzugs //
T02D2227:92b-41: rtag tu don gyi bya byed pa //
T02D2227:92b-42: so so'i skad cig de nyid la //
T02D2227:92b-43: rang gi dngos po nyid byed pa'o //
T02D2227:92b-44: bya ba'i don gcig byas nas ni //
T02D2227:92b-45: de nyid byed pa ma yin la //
T02D2227:92b-46: byed ba byed par mi sbyor te //
T02D2227:92b-47: byas na de nyid gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D2227:92b-48: snga ma'i rang bzhin rnam kun du //
T02D2227:92b-49: skad cig gzhan gyi rjes mi 'jug / skad cig ma yi rgyun 'dra bas //
T02D2227:93a-1: shes la sogs so sor gnas //
T02D2227:93a-2: da ltar mngon sum gyur pa'i don //
T02D2227:93a-3: yongs su gcod pa de bzhin yang //
T02D2227:93a-4: de ni rnam par gcod pa ste //
T02D2227:93a-5: mngon sum las byung bsgom pa yin //
T02D2227:93a-6: snang ba rnam par nyams nas ni //
T02D2227:93a-7: rgyud gzhan dgod pa ma yin te //
T02D2227:93a-8: bskyed pa gzhan ni 'jigs pas ni //
T02D2227:93a-9: rang rig rgyu yis nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2227:93a-10: phra rab rdul ni 'dus pa las //
T02D2227:93a-11: rags pa'i gzugs su mthong ba yi //
T02D2227:93a-12: lus la shing dang sa la sogs //
T02D2227:93a-13: rags pa cung zad gcig pa min //
T02D2227:93a-14: ji ltar de bzhin bde dang sdug / bum pa la sogs so sor ro //
T02D2227:93a-15: gcig la bskyod dang dmar bas su //
T02D2227:93a-16: kun bskyod pa dang dmar por 'gyur //
T02D2227:93a-17: gcig la g-yo bar gyur pa yis //
T02D2227:93a-18: lus kun khyab 'gyur de bzhin no //
T02D2227:93a-19: 'on kyang cha shas bskyod sogs pas //
T02D2227:93a-20: yan lag can la min zhe na //
T02D2227:93a-21: yan lag can nyid mi bskyod na //
T02D2227:93a-22: ji ltar yul gzhan thob par 'gyur //
T02D2227:93a-23: rdul phran 'dus pas phyi rol gyi //
T02D2227:93a-24: snang ba skad cig gang yin pa //
T02D2227:93a-25: shes pa rang gi rnam pa ni //
T02D2227:93a-26: skyes pas yul nyid thob par 'gyur //
T02D2227:93a-27: de nyid tsam gyi spyod yul gyis //
T02D2227:93a-28: thams cad mkhyen pa thob min te //
T02D2227:93a-29: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pas //
T02D2227:93a-30: rgyu ni dbang po dang mnyam 'gyur //
T02D2227:93a-31: phyed dang ma phyed rnam brtags pas //
T02D2227:93a-32: shes pa'i bye brag skyes don med //
T02D2227:93a-33: bems po bems min rnam brtags pas //
T02D2227:93a-34: kun nas skye ba yod ma yin //
T02D2227:93a-35: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po yang //
T02D2227:93a-36: 'di la blo dang ldan pas bsgom //
T02D2227:93a-37: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D2227:93a-38: tshogs ma rdzogs na yod ma yin //
T02D2227:93a-39: mngon du byed pa mi bya ste //
T02D2227:93a-40: byas na theg pa dman par gyur //
T02D2227:93a-41: zab mo'i rim la goms pa yis //
T02D2227:93a-42: byang chub rtsa ba snying rje yin //
T02D2227:93a-43: snying rje rtsa ba rab sbyor bas ;
T02D2227:93a-44: / bye brag smra ba'ang de bzhin te //
T02D2227:93a-45: theg chen rim pas goms pa yis //
T02D2227:93a-46: rdzogs pa'i byang chub cis mi 'gyur //
T02D2227:93a-47: gzhan du mdo sde pas rtogs pa'i //
T02D2227:93a-48: blo de ji ltar theg chen yin //
T02D2227:93a-49: gang phyir dbu ma dang bral bas //
T02D2227:93a-50: de la'ang sangs rgyas yod ma yin //
T02D2227:93b-0: @93b gnas pa tsam gyi bye brag gis //
T02D2227:93b-1: theg pa nges pa med pa'i phyir //
T02D2227:93b-2: shes rab 'ba' zhig dgra bcom dang //
T02D2227:93b-3: dbu ma pas kyang mthong ba'o //
T02D2227:93b-4: theg chen snying rje sbyor ba las //
T02D2227:93b-5: sbyin sogs lam ni lhag par 'gyur //
T02D2227:93b-6: sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa rnams //
T02D2227:93b-7: gnas pa'i dbye ba gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D2227:93b-8: gal te chung ngu 'bring sogs pa'i //
T02D2227:93b-9: dbye ba phye ste rab brtags nas //
T02D2227:93b-10: de ni so so rnam pa dgu //
T02D2227:93b-11: de ni theg pa gnas par phye //
T02D2227:93b-12: mdo sde pa yi gnas pa bsdus //
T02D2227:93b-13: rdul phran cha shas med pa'i phyir //
T02D2227:93b-14: phan tshun yang dag sbyor ba med ;
T02D2227:93b-15: / thams cad 'bral med bdag nyid pas //
T02D2227:93b-16: rags pa cung zad tsam yang med //
T02D2227:93b-17: dbang po las 'das rang rgyud pas //
T02D2227:93b-18: 'dus pa yang ni de bzhin no //
T02D2227:93b-19: gal te rags pa'i chos kyi don //
T02D2227:93b-20: shes pa ji ltar dngos med 'gyur //
T02D2227:93b-21: phye dang ma phye rab brtags pas//
T02D2227:93b-22: don gyi chos de med pa ste //
T02D2227:93b-23: phra mo'i dbye bas bye ba ni //
T02D2227:93b-24: rdzas de ji ltar rags pa yin //
T02D2227:93b-25: dngos dang dngos med 'gal bas na //
T02D2227:93b-26: phye dang ma phye gcig pa med //
T02D2227:93b-28: gcig la 'ang cha shas yod ma yin //
T02D2227:93b-29: phyogs dang snam sogs bye brag gis //
T02D2227:93b-30: sgrub pa'i don la nges pa med //
T02D2227:93b-31: gang phyir 'di don dngos med de //
T02D2227:93b-32: rmi lam gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin //
T02D2227:93b-33: sngon po la sogs don med phyir //
T02D2227:93b-34: rnam par shes pa 'thad ma yin //
T02D2227:93b-35: sna tshogs rnam par snang bas na //
T02D2227:93b-36: ji srid sngo sogs gcig pa min ;
T02D2227:93b-37: / phan tshun 'thad pa ma yin pas //
T02D2227:93b-38: rnam shes sna tshogs ma yin no //
T02D2227:93b-39: bag chags stobs kyis gzung ba dang //
T02D2227:93b-40: 'dzin pa lta bur phye ba'i phyir //
T02D2227:93b-41: snang ba'i bye brag sngon po sogs //
T02D2227:93b-42: bden min 'khrul bas rnam pa med //
T02D2227:93b-43: 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du ni //
T02D2227:93b-44: de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs //
T02D2227:93b-45: de ltar bus pas rnam brtags pa'i //
T02D2227:93b-46: phyi rol don ni yod ma yin //
T02D2227:93b-47: bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems //
T02D2227:93b-48: don du rab tu snang bar 'jug / rnam pa med par mos pa yis //
T02D2227:94a-0: gsum po dmigs pa med pa @94a * //
T02D2227:94a-2: / sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T02D2227:94a-3: so sor 'khor gsum rtse gcig bya //
T02D2227:94a-4: thos dang bsams pa las byung dang //
T02D2227:94a-5: bsgoms pa las skyes shes rab ni //
T02D2227:94a-6: bsam gtan las skyes rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2227:94a-7: zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ngo ;
T02D2227:94a-8: / bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsungs pa //
T02D2227:94a-9: sems tsam la ni brten nas su //
T02D2227:94a-10: pha rol don du mi brtag go //
T02D2227:94a-11: de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas nas //
T02D2227:94a-12: sems can las kyang 'brang bar bya //
T02D2227:94a-13: sems tsam nyid la 'das nas su //
T02D2227:94a-14: snang ba med las 'da' bar bya//
T02D2227:94a-15: snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
T02D2227:94a-16: des ni theg pa chen po mthong //
T02D2227:94a-17: 'jug ba lhun gyis grub cing zhi //
T02D2227:94a-18: smon lam rnam par dag nas ni //
T02D2227:94a-19: ye shes dam pa bdag med pa //
T02D2227:94a-20: snang ba med pa mthong ba yin //
T02D2227:94a-22: sna tshogs gsal ba de nyid kun du brtags pa sdug bsngal te //
T02D2227:94a-23: kun 'byung gi ni bag chags gzhan gyi dbang gis rang bzhin no //
T02D2227:94a-24: sbyin ba la sogs lam nyid yongs su rdzogs pa 'gog pa ste //
T02D2227:94a-25: rdzogs par yongs su grub pa rnam med rnam par rig pa tsam //
T02D2227:94a-26: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam rnam pa med pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o /
T02D2227:94a-28: // / gang gang cung zad snang ba ni //
T02D2227:94a-29: de de sems la shin tu gsal //
T02D2227:94a-30: ji ltar de bzhin rmi lam sems //
T02D2227:94a-31: gzugs la sogs pa so sor snang //
T02D2227:94a-32: ji ltar so sor snang ba'i sems /
T02D2227:94a-33: bag chags la ni rnam gnas pa //
T02D2227:94a-34: ci ste don med rnam shes ni //
T02D2227:94a-35: ji ltar gzhan las shes par 'gyur //
T02D2227:94a-36: don gyi snang ba'i phyi rol na //
T02D2227:94a-37: bse ru lta bur thub pas gsungs //
T02D2227:94a-38: gzung dang 'dzin pa stong par ni //
T02D2227:94a-39: snang med pa dag 'dod pa yin //
T02D2227:94a-40: rnam shes so sor snang bas na //
T02D2227:94a-41: sngon po la sogs don med de //
T02D2227:94a-42: de phyir kun gyis rnam pa bsgom //
T02D2227:94a-43: mi rtog snying rje chen po yin //
T02D2227:94a-44: kun 'byung bag chags bstan pa ni //
T02D2227:94a-45: sbyin pa la sogs bag chags spang //
T02D2227:94a-46: sdug bsngal thams cad 'gog pa yang //
T02D2227:94a-47: sna tshogs gnyis su med pas mthong //
T02D2227:94a-48: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D2227:94b-0: @94b gzung dang 'dzin pa stong pa nyid //
T02D2227:94b-1: gsal bar byed pa'i chos sku las //
T02D2227:94b-2: longs spyod rdzogs dang sbrul pa 'phro //
T02D2227:94b-3: gzung ba la sogs med pa'i dngos //
T02D2227:94b-4: snang ba'i bag chags yod ma yin //
T02D2227:94b-5: de bzhin gnyis ka yod ma yin //
T02D2227:94b-6: gzugs las gzhan du mi rtog go //
T02D2227:94b-7: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i //
T02D2227:94b-8: dngos po 'di ni med pa min //
T02D2227:94b-9: rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin yang //
T02D2227:94b-10: ye shes rang rig nyams myong yin //
T02D2227:94b-11: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i las rnam pa dang bcas pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o /
T02D2227:94b-13: // / mu stegs sangs rgyas par ma btus//
T02D2227:94b-14: gsum ni med par mi 'dod pas //
T02D2227:94b-15: legs shing mdzes pa dam pa'i chos //
T02D2227:94b-16: med par gnas pa'i sdig pa yin //
T02D2227:94b-17: dbu ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02D2227:94b-18: gnas pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
T02D2227:94b-19: btud de gnas pa zad byed nyid //
T02D2227:94b-20: lung dang rigs pas bshad par bya ;
T02D2227:94b-21: / khams rnams nyid las grub pa gang //
T02D2227:94b-22: rkyen las skyes pa skad cig ma //
T02D2227:94b-23: gcig dang du ma dang bral bas //
T02D2227:94b-24: de nyid dngos po med pa yin //
T02D2227:94b-25: de yang lus la rkang lag dang //
T02D2227:94b-26: mgo dang rgyab sogs phye ba las //
T02D2227:94b-27: lag pa la sogs gcig kyang med //
T02D2227:94b-28: so sor phye bas byung ba yin //
T02D2227:94b-29: ji srid de yi cha phye ste //
T02D2227:94b-30: rdul phran rnam par dpyad pa ni //
T02D2227:94b-31: lus po nyid ni bshad pa las //
T02D2227:94b-32: rten dang brten pa la sogs shes //
T02D2227:94b-33: gcig gi dngos po bgag pas na //
T02D2227:94b-34: du ma'ang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2227:94b-35: rmi lam dang ni mnyam gnas par //
T02D2227:94b-36: sngon du bkag pa nyid kyis min //
T02D2227:94b-37: shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir //
T02D2227:94b-38: rig pa nyid dang 'gal ba min //
T02D2227:94b-39: gang phyir spyi yi gtan tshigs kyis //
T02D2227:94b-40: brjod pa dam pa'i tshul yin no //
T02D2227:94b-41: kun rdzob don byed nus pa yi //
T02D2227:94b-42: sna tshogs 'di ni rnag bzhin med //
T02D2227:94b-43: de ni shes dang shes bya nyid //
T02D2227:94b-44: kho bos ci zhig yongs su brtag / gzugs sogs so sor snang ba ni //
T02D2227:94b-45: de nyid rnam par shes pa la //
T02D2227:94b-46: de ltar sgrub thabs lta bu ste //
T02D2227:94b-47: blo ldan rigs pas mi 'grub med //
T02D2227:94b-48: kun rdzob tu ni skye ba dang /
T02D2227:94b-49: de ni skye ba med pa'i don //
T02D2227:95a-0: de phyir skye ba med pa'i @95a * //
T02D2227:95a-2: / rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bzhin no //
T02D2227:95a-3: skye ba grub pas yod pa yin //
T02D2227:95a-4: yod pa yin pas med pa'ang med //
T02D2227:95a-5: rgyu yi dngos po med pas na //
T02D2227:95a-6: rang bzhin gzhan las skye ba min //
T02D2227:95a-7: ji ltar gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ltar //
T02D2227:95a-8: bden min brdzun pa ma yin gzugs //
T02D2227:95a-9: de nyid chos rnams thams cad de //
T02D2227:95a-10: rang bzhin rig pa rnams kyi lugs //
T02D2227:95a-11: 'dus pa mkhar dang gos la sogs //
T02D2227:95a-12: brtsams pa kun rdzob dngos po ste //
T02D2227:95a-13: 'di ni rang bzhin ma skyes pas //
T02D2227:95a-14: 'dus pa nyid kyang de bzhin no //
T02D2227:95a-15: de phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis //
T02D2227:95a-17: gzhan gyis smras pa 'di dag kun //
T02D2227:95a-18: bdag gis legs par brjod pa yin //
T02D2227:95a-19: phyogs ni snga mar brjod pa dag /'di ni blo gros rnam par gal //
T02D2227:95a-20: de yi blo gros bsal nas su //
T02D2227:95a-21: rang gi phyogs ni bdag gis bshad //
T02D2227:95a-22: ji ltar me long la gzugs brnyan //
T02D2227:95a-23: gcig dang gzhan nyid spangs pa ltar //
T02D2227:95a-24: snang las gzhan na yod min te //
T02D2227:95a-25: de ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2227:95a-26: 'jig rten sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin //
T02D2227:95a-27: rgyu dang rgyan ni rnam par spangs //
T02D2227:95a-28: rtag tu rgyun med par snang pas ;
T02D2227:95a-29: / rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go //
T02D2227:95a-30: gang la dngos po yod min pas //
T02D2227:95a-31: sems tsam du ni rtogs par bya //
T02D2227:95a-32: ji ltar dngos po med pa'i sems //
T02D2227:95a-33: sems tsam du ni rigs pa min //
T02D2227:95a-34: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bye brag gis //
T02D2227:95a-35: gal te sems ni 'jug pa na //
T02D2227:95a-36: 'jig rten pa yi sems 'di dag / sems tsam du ni mi rigs so //
T02D2227:95a-37: lus dang longs spyod dbang po ni //
T02D2227:95a-38: gal te rmi lam ltar skyes na //
T02D2227:95a-39: sems ni gnyis su 'gyur ba ste //
T02D2227:95a-40: sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis min no //
T02D2227:95a-41: gang phyir ji ltar ral gri'i so //
T02D2227:95a-42: ji ltar rang gi mdzub rtse yis//
T02D2227:95a-43: mi chod pa dang mi reg pa //
T02D2227:95a-44: de bzhin sems nyid rang snang ba'o //
T02D2227:95a-45: gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang ba'i sems //
T02D2227:95a-46: sngon du goms par gyur pa'i blos //
T02D2227:95a-47: ji ltar 'byung ba rnam par mthong //
T02D2227:95a-48: don gyi rnam pa don yod min //
T02D2227:95a-49: gang zag rgyu dang phung po dang //
T02D2227:95b-0: de @95b bzhin rkyen dang rdul phran dang //
T02D2227:95b-1: gtso bo dbang phyug byed pa po //
T02D2227:95b-2: sems tsam po la rnam par brtags //
T02D2227:95b-3: phyi rol don mthong log pa ste //
T02D2227:95b-4: don gzhan med pa'i sems nyid do //
T02D2227:95b-5: rigs pas yid la brtags nas ni //
T02D2227:95b-7: blo yis rnam par gzhig na ni //
T02D2227:95b-8: rang bzhin nges par gzung du med //
T02D2227:95b-9: de ni brjod du med pa'i phyir //
T02D2227:95b-10: dngos po med par bstan pa yin //
T02D2227:95b-11: yid la blo yis rnam brtags na //
T02D2227:95b-12: gzhan dbang med cing kun brtags med na //
T02D2227:95b-13: yongs su grub pa'i dngos med na //
T02D2227:95b-14: ji ltar blo yis rnams par dpyad //
T02D2227:95b-15: rang bzhin med cing rig byed med //
T02D2227:95b-16: dngos med gzhi yang yod ma yin //
T02D2227:95b-17: nus pa ro dang mtshungs pa'i phyir //
T02D2227:95b-18: rtog ge ngan pas 'di dag brtags //
T02D2227:95b-19: dngos po mtshan ma rnam rig go //
T02D2227:95b-20: yid log g-yo ba gang yin las //
T02D2227:95b-21: nga yi lus rnams 'das nas su //
T02D2227:95b-22: rnam par mi rtog pa yis spyod //
T02D2227:95b-23: de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid mtha' //
T02D2227:95b-24: mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings //
T02D2227:95b-25: skye ba med pa'i chos rnams ni //
T02D2227:95b-26: dam pa'i don gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2227:95b-27: phyi rol dngos dang dngos med de //
T02D2227:95b-28: sems kyis yongs su gzung ba med //
T02D2227:95b-29: lta ba thams cad spangs pa gang //
T02D2227:95b-30: skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2227:95b-31: gang phyir tshogs pa'i rkyen yod na //
T02D2227:95b-33: tshogs pa so sor gyur na ni //
T02D2227:95b-34: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
T02D2227:95b-35: yod med dngos po skye ba med //
T02D2227:95b-36: sems ni yod min med pa min //
T02D2227:95b-37: gang phyir las gzhan 'dus pa las //
T02D2227:95b-38: 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa min //
T02D2227:95b-40: 'dus pa nyid ni mthong ba ste //
T02D2227:95b-41: tshogs pa tsam po 'di nyid ni //
T02D2227:95b-42: de tshe sems la mnyam par gnas //
T02D2227:95b-43: gang la cung zad skye med pas //
T02D2227:95b-44: dgag pa cung zad yod ma yin //
T02D2227:95b-45: de ni yod dang med min te //
T02D2227:95b-47: zung du 'jug pa yongs shes na //
T02D2227:95b-48: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje che //
T02D2227:95b-49: mkhas pas kun rdzob de nyid kyang //
T02D2227:96a-2: / gang phyir kun rdzob log na ni //
T02D2227:96a-3: de phyir de nyid ci yang med //
T02D2227:96a-4: kun rdzob nyid kyis skye ba gang //
T02D2227:96a-5: de nyid skye ba med pa'i don //
T02D2227:96a-7: rkyen las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2227:96a-8: de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings //
T02D2227:96a-9: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog / yang dag mtha' dang skye ba med //
T02D2227:96a-10: mi dmigs pa dang mya ngan 'das //
T02D2227:96a-11: stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang //
T02D2227:96a-12: smon pa med dang 'dus ma byas //
T02D2227:96a-13: rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs dpe //
T02D2227:96a-14: de nyid rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrubs //
T02D2227:96a-15: theg chen 'di ni mchog yin te //
T02D2227:96a-16: nges don mdo sder bsdus pa yi //
T02D2227:96a-17: mdo sde lta zhing nyan pa la //
T02D2227:96a-19: snying rje sems can la bskyed de //
T02D2227:96a-20: byang chub sems ni brtson byas nas //
T02D2227:96a-21: byang chub sdom gnas brtson chen pos //
T02D2227:96a-22: rang bzhin med pa bsgom par bya//
T02D2227:96a-23: 'phags pa'i lam brgyad la gnas te //
T02D2227:96a-24: sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs la 'bad //
T02D2227:96a-25: mkhas rnams gang phyir bden gnyis gnyis med 'dis //
T02D2227:96a-26: ji ltar de nyid don de chad pa lta bur ni //
T02D2227:96a-27: mngon sum grub pa skye dang 'gag pa'i snod yin te //
T02D2227:96a-28: gal te don skyes rnam par nyams pa'i skyon yin no //
T02D2227:96a-29: gang phyir ji ltar me long nang du gzugs brnyan mthong //
T02D2227:96a-30: rigs pas brtags pa'i stobs kyis de med de mthong med //
T02D2227:96a-31: phyi yi don med 'di yang med de rnam par sna tshogs sems //
T02D2227:96a-32: 'on kyang rten 'brel dag la rigs pas 'gal ba med //
T02D2227:96a-33: 'di ni dbu ma'i gnas su bsdus pa'o //
T02D2227:96a-34: de ltar mtha' bzhi rnam spangs pa //
T02D2227:96a-35: brtags te brtan par byas nas su //
T02D2227:96a-36: skye ba med cing gnas pa med //
T02D2227:96a-37: 'gag pa med cing mtshan nyid med //
T02D2227:96a-38: rang rig rkyen las skyes pa ste //
T02D2227:96a-39: de nyid pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02D2227:96a-40: phyag rgya bzhi yi rang bzhin lung //
T02D2227:96a-41: sngags kyi tshul la bsten nas su //
T02D2227:96a-42: bla ma'i khyad par myong pa yin //
T02D2227:96a-43: ma brtags par yang som nyi med //
T02D2227:96a-44: stong pa nyid ni rang rig ste //
T02D2227:96a-45: thabs dang shes rab bde chen po //
T02D2227:96a-46: 'bras gnas bzhin du rtsod pa med //
T02D2227:96b-0: byang chub sems @96b ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D2227:96b-2: gsang sngags tshul de shes pa yis //
T02D2227:96b-3: sngags kyi lugs kyi khyad par gsungs //
T02D2227:96b-4: don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang //
T02D2227:96b-5: thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang //
T02D2227:96b-6: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas nas //
T02D2227:96b-7: sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags //
T02D2227:96b-8: gang phyir stong pa rig pa nyid //
T02D2227:96b-9: ye shes rang bzhin skad cig ma //
T02D2227:96b-10: gang phyir rdo rje sems dpar nges //
T02D2227:96b-11: phung po de bzhin gshegs par rtogs //
T02D2227:96b-12: rigs pa'i stobs kyis gzhag pa gang //
T02D2227:96b-13: ma brtags pa ru sbyor ba don //
T02D2227:96b-14: ci ste yongs su brtag bral ba //
T02D2227:96b-15: sngags kyis tshul dang bral na ni //
T02D2227:96b-16: rnam pa kun du dpe med na //
T02D2227:96b-17: zag pa med pa'i bde ba che //
T02D2227:96b-18: lha yi nga rgyal blta byas pa //
T02D2227:96b-19: ji ltar stong nyid nyams su myong //
T02D2227:96b-20: las kyi phyag rgya legs grub nas //
T02D2227:96b-21: chos kyi phyag rgya rab phye bas //
T02D2227:96b-22: phan tshun re ba med na ni //
T02D2227:96b-23: dam tshig 'bras bu ji ltar yin //
T02D2227:96b-24: thabs ni mang po rnams kyis su //
T02D2227:96b-25: nyams su myong ba'i khyad par dang //
T02D2227:96b-26: las dang chos dang phyag rgya che //
T02D2227:96b-27: dbye ba gzhan du ji ltar yin //
T02D2227:96b-28: shin tu dbang po rnon po yis //
T02D2227:96b-29: stong nyid nyams su myong ba yang //
T02D2227:96b-30: bde chen mngon par byang chub la //
T02D2227:96b-31: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas //
T02D2227:96b-32: der ni shin tu bde ba nyid //
T02D2227:96b-33: de ltar thabs kyi dngos po yis //
T02D2227:96b-34: dang po'i dus la goms pa las //
T02D2227:96b-35: gzhan du ji ltar dka' ba min //
T02D2227:96b-36: pha rol phyin pa kun bdag nyid //
T02D2227:96b-37: bsgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na ;
T02D2227:96b-38: / rdzogs pa'i byang chub grub pa la //
T02D2227:96b-39: dbang po rnon pos cis mi 'grub //
T02D2227:96b-40: lhan cig skyes dga' rtogs pa'o //
T02D2227:96b-41: ae bam las ni phyag byas nas //
T02D2227:96b-42: phyag rgya'i rang bzhin mdor bsdus pa //
T02D2227:96b-43: sngags kyi theg pa bshad par bya //
T02D2227:96b-44: shes rab sprul pa'i gzugs can ma ;
T02D2227:96b-45: / las kyi phyag rgya bdag med nyid //
T02D2227:96b-46: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi las //
T02D2227:96b-47: ye shes gtso bo'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2227:96b-48: gang phyir de las shes pa gang //
T02D2227:96b-49: dga' ba la sogs rim skyes pa //
T02D2227:96b-50: dbus su rnam par shes pa ste //
T02D2227:96b-51: de ni shes rab ye shes brjod //
T02D2227:97a-1: bcas dang ni rnam pa med //
T02D2227:97a-2: de bzhin dbu ma'i rtog pa'o //
T02D2227:97a-3: ji ltar mos pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D2227:97a-4: man ngag gis ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2227:97a-5: gsum pa'i lhan cig skyes par rtogs //
T02D2227:97a-6: btsan thabs dbang gis bzhi pa ste //
T02D2227:97a-7: rlung gi bkod pas sna rtsel //
T02D2227:97a-8: mi 'gyur ba yi sbyor ba yin //
T02D2227:97a-9: ji lta ji ltar bed ye shes //
T02D2227:97a-10: thabs kyis rab tu bsgrub pa yin //
T02D2227:97a-11: de lta de ltar rtogs pa ste //
T02D2227:97a-12: rtog pa lhan cig skyes pa mchog //
T02D2227:97a-14: btsan thabs lhan cig skyes par 'dod //
T02D2227:97a-15: yun ring dus su 'bral med gnas ;
T02D2227:97a-16: / ma bcos pa yi tshogs yin no //
T02D2227:97a-18: dga' ba khu ba 'bab pa ste //
T02D2227:97a-19: gtsug tor smin phrag padma'i tshal //
T02D2227:97a-20: mgrin pa snying gar mchog dga' ste //
T02D2227:97a-21: de nas dga' ba bral bar 'gyur //
T02D2227:97a-22: sna tshogs rol mos lte ba nas //
T02D2227:97a-23: ji srid gsang ba'i padmar son //
T02D2227:97a-24: de srid gsang ba'i nor bu nas //
T02D2227:97a-25: ma 'phros bar du lhan cig skyes //
T02D2227:97a-26: mi gnas pa yi mya ngan 'das //
T02D2227:97a-27: 'dod chags chen po'i khyab bdag gtso //
T02D2227:97a-28: ma 'phros bde ba chags bral te //
T02D2227:97a-30: chags bral las ni sdig pa med //
T02D2227:97a-31: bde ba mchog las bsod nams med //
T02D2227:97a-32: de phyir mi 'gyur bde ba'i sems //
T02D2227:97a-33: rtag tu der gnas mos par bya //
T02D2227:97a-35: chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung //
T02D2227:97a-36: sdug bsngal bas ni khams zad de //
T02D2227:97a-38: shi nas de dag bzhin du 'ang 'byung //
T02D2227:97a-39: srid par 'ching zhing skye ba ste //
T02D2227:97a-40: de phyir 'bad pas thams cad kyis //
T02D2227:97a-41: chags pa dor ba rnam par spangs //
T02D2227:97a-42: chags bral 'dod ldan ma yin te //
T02D2227:97a-44: nga yis bstan pa rgyun du yang //
T02D2227:97a-45: ci ste rnal 'byor sdug bsngal bskyed //
T02D2227:97a-46: bde ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2227:97a-47: mi 'gyur mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D2227:97a-48: rten ni shor bar gyur pa yis //
T02D2227:97a-49: rten pa chags dang bral pa yin //
T02D2227:97a-50: spyi bor rgyas pa'i thig le ni //
T02D2227:97b-0: shes rab chags las zhu bar @97b 'gyur ;
T02D2227:97b-1: / gang par gnas pa'i go 'phang ni //
T02D2227:97b-2: bcings pa dam pa'i don yin no //
T02D2227:97b-3: ji ltar zla ba 'char ba'i rim //
T02D2227:97b-5: de bzhin sems bskyed rim pa ni //
T02D2227:97b-6: 'phel ba'i dus kyis rdzogs pa yin //
T02D2227:97b-7: de ni gtsug nas byung nas su //
T02D2227:97b-8: rdo rje nor bu gang bar 'gyur //
T02D2227:97b-9: de ni chags dang bral na nyams //
T02D2227:97b-10: rdo rje rtse mor rab rgyas 'gyur //
T02D2227:97b-11: bde chen rang bzhin 'di nyid ni //
T02D2227:97b-12: rdzogs pa'i sgra yis bstan pa yin //
T02D2227:97b-13: rdzogs pa mi bskyod gyur pa yin //
T02D2227:97b-14: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T02D2227:97b-15: ji ltar chu yi chu sna tshogs //
T02D2227:97b-16: rgya mtsho chen por ro mnyam 'gyur //
T02D2227:97b-17: de bzhin dngos po sna tshogs kyang //
T02D2227:97b-19: ji ltar khams rnams 'dus pa nyid //
T02D2227:97b-20: gang zhig dngul chus phug pa ltar //
T02D2227:97b-21: dngos po sna tshogs 'di dag kyang //
T02D2227:97b-22: mi 'gyur mchog gis za ba yin //
T02D2227:97b-23: mi 'gyur mchog gi bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2227:97b-24: rnam pa kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
T02D2227:97b-25: stong pa las skyes dngos po rgyu //
T02D2227:97b-27: rgyu la 'bras bu bde rgyas btab //
T02D2227:97b-29: stong nyid dngos po 'dzin pa'i rgyu //
T02D2227:97b-31: byang chub sems de ma 'phos na //
T02D2227:97b-32: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D2227:97b-33: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas //
T02D2227:97b-35: sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med ;
T02D2227:97b-36: / dngos dang dngos med mtshan nyid gcig / yul dang dbang po'i sgo yis su //
T02D2227:97b-37: sems ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2227:97b-38: gzhan du sprul gyis zos pa yi //
T02D2227:97b-39: sdug bsngal tshor ba rig pa min //
T02D2227:97b-40: ji ltar lcags kyi phyogs gcig na //
T02D2227:97b-41: gang phyir gser 'gyur rtsi gnas pa ;
T02D2227:97b-42: /'bar ba'i me yis bsregs na ni //
T02D2227:97b-43: thams cad gser du 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2227:97b-44: de bzhin sems kyi phyogs gcig tu 'ang //
T02D2227:97b-45: mi 'gyur ba de la legs gnas pa //
T02D2227:97b-46: 'dod pa'i me yis rab bsregs nas //
T02D2227:97b-47: thams cad bde bar gyur pa yin //
T02D2227:98a-2: nam yang nag por 'gyur ba min //
T02D2227:98a-3: de bzhin sems nyid rtogs pa yang //
T02D2227:98a-4: rnam yang bag chags 'gyur ba min //
T02D2227:98a-5: gang phyir me yis sbyangs ba'i gser //
T02D2227:98a-6: lcags su gyur pa ma yin no //
T02D2227:98a-7: de bzhin phyir zhing phyir zhing sems //
T02D2227:98a-8: 'dod chags me yis dri ma med //
T02D2227:98a-9: 'dir mang smra ba ci zhig dgos //
T02D2227:98a-10: 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa la //
T02D2227:98a-11: lcags ni 'gyur bar byed pa yi //
T02D2227:98a-12: rtsi yi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab //
T02D2227:98a-13: don dam par ni rab brtags na //
T02D2227:98a-14: glo bur dri mas gos pa yi //
T02D2227:98a-15: sems nyid rtogs par gyur pa na //
T02D2227:98a-16: ye shes rang bzhin smos ci dgos //
T02D2227:98a-17: ji ltar rtsi yis bsgyur ba'i lcags //
T02D2227:98a-18: lcags kyi rjes su 'gro ba min //
T02D2227:98a-19: de bzhin bde bas bsgyur ba'i sems //
T02D2227:98a-20: sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur ba min //
T02D2227:98a-23: rdo rje dbyings phyug ma yi rtsa //
T02D2227:98a-24: bha ga'i dbus na rnam par gnas //
T02D2227:98a-25: 'bad pas nye bar thob nas su //
T02D2227:98a-26: bla ma'i bka' la goms pa yis //
T02D2227:98a-27: mdzub mo cung zad bskyod pa yis //
T02D2227:98a-28: phyi nang lce dang rdo rje yis //
T02D2227:98a-29: rtsa de rgyas par gyur pa las //
T02D2227:98a-30: mchog tu bde ba rab tu 'bab //
T02D2227:98a-31: pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa ste //
T02D2227:98a-32: stobs dang dbang po rnams dang ldan //
T02D2227:98a-33: sa bcu las ni 'das nas su //
T02D2227:98a-34: de las rtags su gyur pa med //
T02D2227:98a-37: gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni //
T02D2227:98a-38: rnal 'byor pa ni bde bar gnas //
T02D2227:98a-39: 'gyur med thun nas zhag gcig gam //
T02D2227:98a-40: zla phyed zla ba lo gcig gam //
T02D2227:98a-41: bskal pa'am bskal pa stong du 'am //
T02D2227:98a-42: ye shes mngon par sbyor pas gnas //
T02D2227:98a-44: ji srid rnal 'byor byang chub sems //
T02D2227:98a-45: gtong par byed pa ma yin pas //
T02D2227:98a-47: dga' ba las skyes bde ba yi //
T02D2227:98a-48: byang chub sems de lhung gyur na //
T02D2227:98a-49: dngos grub kun gyi gter yin pas //
T02D2227:98a-50: rnam shes phung po brgyal 'gyur nas //
T02D2227:98a-51: dngos grub ma smad ga la yod //
T02D2227:98a-53: las dang dam tshig phyag rgya yi //
T02D2227:98a-54: dus su lhan cig skyes pa rtogs //
T02D2227:98a-55: chos kyi phyag rgya phyag rgya che //
T02D2227:98b-0: gnyis ni lhan cig skyes pa @98b mchog / byang sems bral na bde ba yin //
T02D2227:98b-1: brgya lam na yang mi 'thob po //
T02D2227:98b-2: bde chen nyid ni ma gtogs pa //
T02D2227:98b-3: nam yang gsang sngags theg pa med //
T02D2227:98b-4: shes rab ye shes thob pas na //
T02D2227:98b-5: las kyi phyag rgya lhan cig skyes //
T02D2227:98b-6: tha ma 'bring sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D2227:98b-7: de nyid rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02D2227:98b-8: las kyi phyag rgya snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D2227:98b-9: dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D2227:98b-10: tha mas bskyed pa bsgom pa ste //
T02D2227:98b-11: las kyi yan lag dang bral 'bring //
T02D2227:98b-12: rab kyis kyang ni bsam bya ba //
T02D2227:98b-13: myur du rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2227:98b-14: chos kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa ni //
T02D2227:98b-15: tha mas rtsa dang yi ge rim //
T02D2227:98b-16: gtum mo'i bye brag 'bring gis so //
T02D2227:98b-17: mi shigs pa ni rab kyis te //
T02D2227:98b-18: thig le phra sogs rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2227:98b-19: bsdus pa rig par 'dod pa yin //
T02D2227:98b-20: rab kyi tha mas bsgom bya na //
T02D2227:98b-21: khams gsum po ni gzhal yas khang ;
T02D2227:98b-22: / sems can rnams ni dkyil 'khor ba //
T02D2227:98b-23: rnal 'byor pa ni dkyil 'khor bdag / de bshad pa //
T02D2227:98b-24: 'di ni gnas gsum ma yin gzhal yas khang pa yin //
T02D2227:98b-25: srog chags ma yin 'di ni rgyal ba yin //
T02D2227:98b-26: 'khor lo'i bdag po nga yin dbang po ma yin te //
T02D2227:98b-27: sa la sogs pa 'ang ma yin gzugs la sogs pa 'ang min //
T02D2227:98b-28: chos nyid bdag nyid de nyid des na dkyil 'khor pa yang yin //
T02D2227:98b-29: sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'khor lor shes na ci ste 'khrul par byed //
T02D2227:98b-31: khams bzhi dang ni phung po dag / lha mo ye shes he ru kas ;
T02D2227:98b-32: /'khor lo rgyas btab de bzhin nyid //
T02D2227:98b-33: rab kyi 'bring po'i bsgom bya ba //
T02D2227:98b-34: sna tshogs pa bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2227:98b-35: thabs dang shes rab stobs kyis su //
T02D2227:98b-36: zung 'jug lhun gyis grub pa ste //
T02D2227:98b-37: dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa nyid //
T02D2227:98b-38: sems ni rtog med sbyor bas kyang ;
T02D2227:98b-39: / sems de nyid ni brtag mi bya //
T02D2227:98b-40: kun nas thams cad mchog yin te //
T02D2227:98b-41: rnam med dbang po'i yul las 'das //
T02D2227:98b-42: dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin nyid //
T02D2227:98b-43: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02D2227:98b-44: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol zhing //
T02D2227:99a-0: mtha' bzhi dag ni mnyam par @99a * //
T02D2227:99a-2: / sna tshogs sgro btags gnas pa med //
T02D2227:99a-3: chags med bde ba chen po nyid //
T02D2227:99a-4: 'bras bu de nyid mi mthun phyogs //
T02D2227:99a-5: brtags pa de nyid ma brtags pa'o //
T02D2227:99a-6: de rkyen thob pas skye ba ste //
T02D2227:99a-7: skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2227:99a-8: bems po med de rang rig pas //
T02D2227:99a-9: mi shes pa dang ma mthong ba //
T02D2227:99a-10: brtags pas nam mkha' dngos med de //
T02D2227:99a-12: chad pa min pas dngos med min //
T02D2227:99a-13: skye ba med pas rang bzhin nyid //
T02D2227:99a-14: kun rdzob las skyes dngos po ste //
T02D2227:99a-15: chos rnams thams cad lhan cig skyes //
T02D2227:99a-16: gnyug ma'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02D2227:99a-17: bdag byin brlabs pas rang byung ste /
T02D2227:99a-18: mi nyams pas na mi shigs pa'o //
T02D2227:99a-19: chos kyi phyag rgya phyag rgya che //
T02D2227:99a-20: gnyis med mos pas ldan pa'o //
T02D2227:99a-21: dbang po mchog gi rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2227:99a-22: rab kyi yang ni rab yin no //
T02D2227:99a-23: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pas //
T02D2227:99a-24: sgom pa'i rig pa bdag la med //
T02D2227:99a-25: ji ltar bskyed pas nyams myong pas //
T02D2227:99a-26: dran dang dran pa nyams pa nyid //
T02D2227:99a-27: ma skyes pa yi ro tshor bas //
T02D2227:99a-28: de bzhin bsgom pa'ang rtogs pa'o //
T02D2227:99a-29: gang phyir shes rab bsgom pa yis //
T02D2227:99a-30: stong nyid so sor rtogs pa yin //
T02D2227:99a-31: dpal ldan dgyes rdor sogs rgyud du //
T02D2227:99a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs //
T02D2227:99a-33: chos rnams thams cad yongs shes na //
T02D2227:99a-34: bsgom pa nyid ni bsgom pa min //
T02D2227:99a-35: gang phyir bdag byin brlab rim des //
T02D2227:99a-36: zung 'jug rim pa 'ang de bzhin no ;
T02D2227:99a-37: / bde chen mngon par rdzogs byang chub //
T02D2227:99a-38: de bzhin phyag rgya chen po mchog / chos kyi de nyid rig pa yis //
T02D2227:99a-39: ngal bar gyur pa ma yin te //
T02D2227:99a-40: chos kyi de nyid la bzhugs phyir //
T02D2227:99a-41: de yis 'byed par rab tu bstan //
T02D2227:99a-42: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis //
T02D2227:99a-43: gsal bar gyur gyi gzhan du min //
T02D2227:99a-44: 'di la gzhan gyis bstan pa yis //
T02D2227:99a-45: don rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2227:99a-46: chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni //
T02D2227:99a-47: ji bzhin 'di la rtogs par gsungs //
T02D2227:99a-48: rang gi mos pas tshig gi don //
T02D2227:99a-49: gzung ba dngos ma yin no //
T02D2227:99b-0: de bzhin bzhi po thams @99b cad kyang //
T02D2227:99b-1: 'di la sogs pa gsungs pa ni //
T02D2227:99b-2: ji ltar de bzhin sku bzhi pa'o //
T02D2227:99b-3: bla ma dam pa'i thabs kyis gsal //
T02D2227:99b-4: stong nyid bde ba dngos po ste //
T02D2227:99b-5: bde ba bde ba chen por 'dod //
T02D2227:99b-6: bde ba ro mnyam bde ba nyid //
T02D2227:99b-7: lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi sku //
T02D2227:99b-8: de nyid bde ba'i don byed pas //
T02D2227:99b-9: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa yang //
T02D2227:99b-10: rnam pa lnga yi ro de nyid //
T02D2227:99b-11: thams cad gnyug mar bye brag med //
T02D2227:99b-13: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2227:99b-14: zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa yang //
T02D2227:99b-15: sku lnga thob par gyur pa ni //
T02D2227:99b-16: de nyid ro gcig pa yi tshul //
T02D2227:99b-17: sku bzhi ru ni rnam phye ba //
T02D2227:99b-18: dbyer med pas na rnam lnga ba'o //
T02D2227:99b-19: de nyid tsam du gcig pa 'di //
T02D2227:99b-20: sku yang de ltar 'dod pa yin //
T02D2227:99b-21: ji ltar 'di ni bdag gi blos //
T02D2227:99b-22: so sor rig pa mnyam par 'jug / dam chos yul la shes rab kyis //
T02D2227:99b-23: ji ltar blo gros kyis thob ltar //
T02D2227:99b-24: 'di ni cung zad brjod pa las //
T02D2227:99b-25: ji ltar 'byung ba'i don rtogs pa //
T02D2227:99b-26: 'gro rnams de yi snod du shog / gnas pa bsdu pa rdzogs so /
T02D2227:99b-28: // / slob dpon chen po dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D2227:99b-29: rdo rjes mdzad pa bla ma dha ri shr'i dzny'a
T02D2227:99b-31: bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o //
T02D2227:99b-32: phyis par ston gyis zhus nas bla ma rgya gar ba dang /
